Package cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models.AbsGameBoard
cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameBoard
public class GameBoard extends AbsGameBoard implements IGameBoard
This class will contain our game board for the fast implementation
Invariant:
Every spot in GameBoard should be ' ' unless played on AND if a spot in GameBoard gets played on it should by the current player's marker AND GameBoard should be of size numRows x numColumns AND MIN_ROWS < numRows < MAX_ROWS AND MIN_COLS < numCols < MAX_COLS

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(int nR, int nC, int nTW)
      This constructor creates an empty gameBoard
      Parameters:
      nR - : is the number of rows chosen by the player
      nC - : is the number of columns chosen by the player
      nTW - : is the num to win which is chosen by the player
      Pre:
      MIN_ROWS < nR < MAX_ROWS AND MIN_Cols < nC < MIN_COLS AND minNTW < numTW < maxNTW num_to_win < num_rows OR numToWin < num_cols [whichever is greater]
      Post:
      [curGameBoard initialized to ' '] AND numRows = nR AND numColumns = nC AND numToWin = nTW
